channel.title: Red Teaming on SecFortress
channel.description: Recent content in Red Teaming on SecFortress

item.title: Bypass Azure Web App Authentication with Path Traversal
item.description: Learn how attackers exploit path traversal vulnerabilities to bypass authentication and gain unauthorized access to Azure Web Apps.

item.title: Azure Recon to Foothold and Profit
item.description: Discover how various reconnaisance techniques could be used to enumerate Azure subscriptions and Tenant to identify mistakes or weak points when setting up an environment
